blogPost.title: The US has now vaccinated over 60% of people aged 75 and above and almost half of those aged 65-74. https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 目前，美国已经有超过60%的75岁及以上的老人接种了疫苗，65-74岁的老人几乎有一半接种了疫苗。https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p。
目前，美國已經有超過60%的75歲及以上的老人接種了疫苗，65-74歲的老人幾乎有一半接種了疫苗。https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p。

TLDR: Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley and JP Morgan are Melvin's main Prime
Brokers. All three firms privately own and sit on the board of the DTCC. If
naked shorting occurred in GME, there's good reason to believe the three named
prime brokers and the DTCC may have shut down 1/28 for nefarious…
